author: John Bowden
title: Romney slams Mormon families gathering at airport to pick up missionaries
description: Sen. Mitt Romney (R-Utah) slammed a group of Mormon families who gathered at the Salt Lake City airport over the weekend to welcome home a group of missionaries in a Facebook post on Monday, calling them "irresponsible."...
